document_data.name: Bryntarth Obarskyr
document_data.parents:
[[Draxius Obarskyr]]
(actually Galaghard I)|children = [[Galaghard Obarskyr III]]|dynasty = [[Obarskyr|Obarskyr Dynasty]]|start of reign = [[875 DR]]|end of reign = [[897 DR]]|predecessor = [[Draxius Obarskyr|Draxius the Neverdying]]|successor = [[Galaghard III]]}}
document_data.mainbody: 'Bryntarth I''' was the 56th [[Obarskyr]] monarch and king of Cormyr from [[875 DR|Year of the Stricken Star, 875 DR]] until his death in the [[897 DR|Year of the Calling Shrike, 897 DR]]. He was born in [[852 DR|Year of the False Smile, 852 DR]], the only son and heir of [[Galaghard I|King Draxius the Neverdying]]. His first born son [[Galaghard III]] ascended the throne after him.
